website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for people looking to tan their skin while protecting from harmful UV rays, the Sun Bum tanning oil contains SPF 15.
pros: Protects against broad spectrum UVA and UVB rays
Created with gentle, moisturizing ingredients that will keep your pores clear
cons: If you're trying to get very dark, the extra SPF in this might be too much sun protection

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it wasnt previously used, returned then sold as new again.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was great. Does stain If you dont let it soak in first. Also, stains your skin a bit as well as to giving the illusion of a darker tan than there really is. Bad- Mine was previously used and probably returned. Had crusty brown product dried on the side as if someone poured some out, then closed it with their palm/wrist. It was then resold as new. Not cool. 1 star for this seller, 5 stars for the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Guapo

customer_reviews.title: Not good, not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased hoping it was similar to Maui Babe Browning lotion. Its different. Not as moisturizing and washes off too easily -- was nonexistent after a quick dip in the pool. MB Browning lotion didn't need to be reapplied so frequently. Formula is a bit thinner than I'm used to and while it's not a bad fragrance, its definitely not reminiscent of the tropics.
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy this again. Helps tan fast and Im usually fair skinned. Worked fast and great
customer_reviews.text: I will buy this again. I love all sunbum products but this stuff is incredible. I am a very fair skinned guy from Michigan and I discovered sunbum in California on vacation and have since then used it every time I'm in the sun. It works perfect and like everything else this stuff is amazing. First of all it smells like chocolate and will make you smell sooo good. My girl loves it. Also it instantly gives you a darker complection. Great product
customer_reviews.author: the great one

customer_reviews.title: Smells So Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this smell like heavenly chocolate but it makes your skin incredibly soft! Love all the good ingredients too. On top of all that it definitely does exactly what it says! I get WAY darker after applying this stuff. Definitely recommend putting spf before if you are planning to stay in the sun for a while. Also not waterproof and you do need to wash your hands after.
customer_reviews.author: Beyenton

customer_reviews.title: I Love SunBum
customer_reviews.text: I definitely should have gone back out into the sun more times while using it, but the few times I did go out, I noticed a difference. This stuff smells really good, almost a chocolately scent. It is definitely a very brown colored lotion so I advise to not wearing a white bathing suit or laying on a white towel while using this lotion. It definitely helped me get a little extra color this summer. I love SunBum’s products. Their sunscreen is the only stuff that really protects my skin so I absolutely trust this product and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Works, but smells like grandmas perfume
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this product DOES help deepen and accelerate my tan but.....it smells very overwhelmingly perfumed like an older lady scent. I was hoping for the classic sun bum scent OR a coffee scent (as lots of these types of lotions have) This product is a cream to oil consistency and it does spread well. I do not recommend using this if you have a white/light colored swimsuit on since this will stain it. That being said the “guide” color does add a nice glow to your skin while you’re laying out. I don’t think I would repurchase this based on the scent, other browning lotions just smell better to me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael M

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I love Sun Bum and all products I have purchased from them so far... but the reason for my 2 star review is that I purchased this tanning oil for a beach vacation and upon arriving at my destination, I went to use it and the sprayer would not work. I tried for 10 minutes trying to get any kind amount of product to come out and it wouldn't. Sprayer was broken, even though it was brand new. I had not used it prior to my trip. I ended up tossing the whole thing in the trash at the resort and having to buy new there. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: All I can say this stuff is amazing. I used this same brand but the lotion spf 50 and worked to good. Spent 7 hours at beach open sun layed out my wife and I and came home not even noticing I went to the beach. I have white olive color skin def didn’t want to burn but was hoping I’d get something more. Kinda funny like I said worked to good. Amazing stuff wife loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: great product would recommend
customer_reviews.text: i bought this product a bout a month ago i have been using it this past week. what i do when i lay out is before i put a tanning sunscreen on first so i don’t burn. then YOU HAVE TO LET THE SUNSCREEN DRY. after it dries up put the tanning lotion on and lay out ! then only thing i have had trouble with is that when laying how is hot and sunny so you’re going to sweat and the oils in the tanning lotion will start to run a little bit but all you have to do is pad it down just a little with a towel. other than that i love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Dries skin out
customer_reviews.text: Well I seem to have to opposite issue everyone else did. The sprayer works fine for me but it doesn’t work. 2 hours in the sun each day and all I end up with at the end of the day is extremely dry peeling skin. I didn’t even burn (which is fine) but I didn’t get darker either. It’s like this stuff dries my skin out so much it won’t get a richer color
customer_reviews.author: ANares

customer_reviews.title: Lovee
customer_reviews.text: Helps get tan without burning (for someone pale like myself). Not as oily as most oils.

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this lotion
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find a lotion for tanning that was chemical free, so I was eager to try this. Upon opening it definitely smells chocolatey, but when rubbing it in it smells gross, like fake chocolate vanilla chapstick or something similiar. It went on ok, but the more I rubbed it in it began to ball up on my skin. It only got worse when I added more thinking that would help to make it less dry before rubbing in. Nope. Left my hands super greasy as well. It was so bad I rinsed it off in the shower. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: nicole127

customer_reviews.title: Refund or exchange requested because the pump spray does not work
customer_reviews.text: I love sunbum and I use it everyday in San Diego and continue to purchase it from amazon due to price . However , this oil pump does not work and have been wasting a ton of product having to not use the spray and would like to have an exchange or refund that works . All the other sunscreen sprays have worked great and even the hair lighting is my favorite ...but this oil does not come out of he spray and it’s difficult to dose the product properly as it is a tanning oil for the skin. I passed the deadline due to being oversees...any suggestions on how to remediate this situation ? Thank you in advance :)
customer_reviews.author: jaclyn mauser

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: ETA: I ended up getting a horrible rash from this. I would never buy it again. I am tanning faster, but I am protected from the sun. This also smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: db4kb

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like, but underwhelmed
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this product, but after 3 uses I realize I just can’t. It will not absorb into my skin, just streaks or pills up in little clumps. Since it won’t absorb it also gets all over the towel or chair you are sitting on. Which I wouldn’t mind if it seemed to be working. I used an SPF of 6 waited 15 minutes, then applied the Sun Bum Browning lotion. Even after waiting for it to absorb then laying in the sun it just streaked and rolled right off of me. It might be helping me brown more than burn but I haven’t noticed it speed up the tanning process. It’s just not why I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Beautiful color and smells good:) I will be useing this from now on .
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Best sun block ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this sun block. The best of it's kind and lightweight and much easier to apply since it's a spray. My completion is milk chocolate but over the years my feet and hands got burned from not using sun block so they're much darker than rest of my body which is so annoying 🙄. But thanks to Sun Bum, it gives you a light tan without burning you. Experiences may vary based on skin type and color but so far it hasn't burned my skin so I know it works for me! Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Best Tanner
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I highly recommend. It gives you a little brown color when you put it on from the tint in the lotion which is great when you are super pale and just starting out on your tanning. However, beware because it does rub off on whatever you are wearing. It washes out mostly, but again it will rub off.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Pump breaks!
customer_reviews.text: Product works nice except for the PUMP. Bought for my gf and after the first day of using it, she brought it back with a broken pump. It’s already hard not getting oil all over the bottle which already makes pumping the product out difficult enough, but the pump will probably quit on you after the first use. This product is marketed for $18 in stores and on Sun Bums website.... 2 stars cause the product is nice just not nice product packaging.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Ball

customer_reviews.title: It was ok
customer_reviews.text: I tried this after Tik Tok exposed Maui Babe and I could not find it anywhere. It is all right. It takes a lot of rubbing to have it fully absorbed and it does stain a little. It makes you feel oily and greasy. The scent is chocolatey and not the original coconut sun bum scent. Also when I received it the bottle had exploded everywhere and did it again when I took it on vacation with me.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Cottam

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Outdoor Suntanning
customer_reviews.text: I used this product one time for sunbathing outside and it worked wonders. I was probably 3 shades darker within a little over an hour with a UV of 7 or 8. The smell smells like a mixture of chocolate and a hint of coffee. I love those smells so the scent was a hit for me! This lotion is dark when applied so you have to focus on blending it into the skin. I love the moisturization it gives. However, this product does not have sunscreen so be sure to at least use an SPF of 15+ when in the sun! Will continue using 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Leaks too much.  Product will empty out before fully using
customer_reviews.text: I haven't fully tried this as it leaked everywhere. It smelled ok, but leaks even when closed and with that being said I couldn't open the bottle for anything other than spray because it was stuck. Hopefully I find another container. Cause I've had to return toooo many things for not working properly. And I don't have the energy or time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing, smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this product and I love it! It is by far my favorite tanning oil I have ever used. It smells amazing and is super moisturizing. I sprayed it over my entire body and in just 30 minutes I had noticeable tan lines. I read a lot of reviews about the sprayer breaking but so far it’s working fine. I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Keira

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because we are going to the beach next month and wanted to develop a base tan so I don't get sunburnt. I used this for the past couple of days, and already have a nice golden glow. Also mind you I was only out for 30 minutes the first day (15 on each side), and then another 30 today (same thing). The smell is really nice, and the color is a pretty bronzy color, and not streaky or orange at all. I love Sun Bum products, but this will now be a staple in my cabinet for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Actually Works
customer_reviews.text: My sister came back from a vacation looking way tanner than usual, and she claimed it was because of this product. I decided to test it out in preparation for a trip to Mexico, and WOW this stuff actually works. The only complaint I have is that it can stain your clothes. It'll come out in the wash, but if you're planning on using this throughout the day, wear dark clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Bayne

customer_reviews.title: If Sensitive Skin Avoid
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a great product with argon oil etc. I missed the fact that the main ingredient is mineral oil. I broke out in a rash all over my body wherever the product was applied. Sadly, I will never buy this product again. Mineral oil and skin pores don't play well in the sandbox together. Too Bad Sun Bum. Pick a better base oil please. Oddly, though oily my skin was fairly dry the next day as well-not moisturized as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I never get super tan, usually I just get burnt. I used this product when the UV was only 7 and it was 60 degrees out. I got tan only sitting out for 2 hours! I had legit tan lines. I was so shocked because I never tan that quickly. I would totally recommend to anyone who wants to get a quick and nice looking tan. Also, it smells soo good which is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Strom

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: This is an EXCELLENT product. My daughter and I both have Olive Skin and don’t burn. We are so tan after being in Florida for only a short time. We normally tan quickly, but this may be the darkest I’ve ever been. I consider the Maui Babe Browning lotion and for half the price decided to try the Sun Bum browning lotion. I’m definitely positive I made the right decision. We are 100% satisfied. It’s been 3 weeks in Florida (in the sun almost every day) and I’m still not done with the first bottle. I feel likei only need 1 applications of this daily. It’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: DMW124

customer_reviews.title: Very good product just apply sunscreen 1st
customer_reviews.text: I have used similar products in past. This goes on very evenly and smells good. I only have one suggestion, ensure you have a layer of sunscreen on prior to putting this on, it will magnify the UV and guaranteed you will get sunburned if you do not.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Love all of Sum Bum ... except this. Omg - the scent.
customer_reviews.text: I love anything that has that classic beachy tanning lotion smell. Sun Bum does a really great job with that on all their products and i love it. I was excited to get a lotion to make my whole body smell amazing like their SPF, Dry Shampoo, etc. What a nassive let down! FIRST, I KNOW THE Smell and can't put my finger on it other than truck stop bathroom. It has this ultra artificial chocolate/coffee smell mixed with a strange floral smell and it's exactly the smell I've walked into so many times in bathrooms, port-a-pottys and cheap hotels. It also has a weird vinyl smell to it. ASIDE FROM that - I like the way it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin be careful!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use what I thought would be a good product for an upcoming vacation. I am sensitive to PABA and usually use a mineral based sunscreen. When I saw this product, I thought it would be great and easy to apply. Which it was. However, despite showering after using the product and spending a day at a lake, I spent the night itching. I woke up in the morning to find a skin rash where I had applied this product. I found out later that mineral oil can be the cause of that. Unfortunately, it is the first inactive ingredient listed. The good news: my husband used the product and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Product is great, but packaging is terrible
customer_reviews.text: So I really loved this product for the 2 days I was able to get it out of the bottle, but the spray pump quite almost immediately. So I figured, ok I'll just remove the top and pour it into my hands, but the top has a lock feature. So now I have a practically full bottle of product that I can't even use. I hope the seller offers me a new bottle, but even if they do, I'm not sure I won't have the same problem again. :(
customer_reviews.author: Donna G. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Smells like chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in the smell of this product because I have bought a ton of Sun Bum stuff and this stuff smells like chocolate which is not a pleasing smell when laying out or hanging out in the sun. It also is not super moisturizing at all, it kind of just sets on the surface of your skin and doesn't soak in well. Not at all excited about it as I thought I would be, especially since the product is pricey.
customer_reviews.author: EWH

customer_reviews.title: Does its job but too oily
customer_reviews.text: It definitely gets the job done in protecting my skin and giving me a tan. My biggest complaint is how it feels on my skin. The oil is SO oily that my skin is crazy wet and slippery for a good 30 minutes before it starts to dry. I felt gross. And you absolutely cannot use it once you’re already on the beach because sand sticks to you like crazy. Also, I used it twice before the spray nozzle broke. Now I have to pour it out straight from the bottle just to use it. Wish I had saved my money and got a spray oil that dries quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Dugger

customer_reviews.title: The best, indoor and out!
customer_reviews.text: So I tan, as often as possible. I have spent way too much money on lotions. Lotions that are meant for tanning and make the same claims as SB. They cost so much more and the results aren't even comparable. After ONE use of this with the spf 15 I'm telling you, nothing compares. SB is always a fav, from hair care to sun! Never going back to anything else.
customer_reviews.author: MJH

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, bad packaging.
customer_reviews.text: This my second time ordering this product. I love using this product. I always order from Amazon and never had a problem before with anything til today. I opened the package to see this. A little disappointed because some of the the lotion is gone now.
customer_reviews.author: Shelbyjrrtt

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with this!
customer_reviews.text: I have used tanning oil before but never anything this moisturizing! My only complaint was that the bottle was leaking but not spraying. I use this every time I lay out, it protects my skin while I also get a beautiful tan. I love the way it smells & all my friends constantly ask to use it so it’s pretty great!
customer_reviews.author: J. Sledge

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It smells fresh, hydrates, and I did not burn! I did reapply after 1 hour on the beach. It is a good way to gradually build your tan. I only stayed in the sun for about 2 hours. If you spend the whole day on the beach and you are fair, you may want to bring a back up spf 30 or higher.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE BOTTLE
customer_reviews.text: Great oil. HORRIBLE BOTTLE. I was able to use this oil twice. After the 3rd use the pump stopped working. I managed to open the bottle, by twisting the cap off, after this the bottle was never sealed correctly and it went to drip the all the oil all over my beach bag & wooden floors. Pretty messy to pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Lex TalSal

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I am crazy about this. After one use I had a beautiful bronze glowing tan. During the winter months I am quite pale and this definitely accelerated the tanning process. It smells like chocolate coconut and leaves my skin soft. So far I have not had an issue with it dying fabric...swimsuit or towels, however you do sweat it off onto your towel. But I give this 10 stars!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christen

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been an avid user of Maui Babe for 15 years and this just seems like a knock off version. It does provide moisture so I have used as a lotion rather than a tanning oil. Doesn’t enhance my tan but does smell wonderful if your into Chocolatiers. I’m here for the color and this product isn’t so sweet in that department.
customer_reviews.author: CiCi

customer_reviews.title: Arrived without factory seal
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without factory seal and leaking in the box. I saw other reviews mentioning lack of seal. I ordered a replacement so I haven't actually been able to use it yet, but looks like this company has some QA issues. I will say that it smells yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This smells so good, kinda like chocolate. I think it does help developing a tan, but it's not a very obvious difference for me. I'll continue to use it for sure, but idk if I'll buy again. Be careful to keep this off of clothes/swimsuits but it rinses out, and be sure to rub it all in to avoid the brown color from transferring.
customer_reviews.author: S. Malone

customer_reviews.title: Great applicator
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this a 5 star review but the bottle came broken and not working. Other than that it was a great product, it has a good scent to it and it works as a sun screen too. Will buy again and hopefully the spray function isn’t broken this time.
customer_reviews.author: jeffery smith

customer_reviews.title: pleeeze get this
customer_reviews.text: Im naturally very pale and this has saved me.. It smells like chocolate and it works great. If you are looking for something that doesn't need the sun this isn't for you bacuse you should put this on then go in the sun for about an hour...This will get you tan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this company but when I received it the spray ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this company but when I received it the spray portion was broke and didnt work at all. Other than that the product works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Carcinogens.
customer_reviews.text: They don't list the toxic ingredients on here and make it seem natural. There are carcinogens in it I threw away when I saw the label.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: You guys, this stuff works so well and so fast. I did some research before hand about tanning and how the skin tans in the first place and didn't know about accelerators. This product was well reviewed so I went with it and purchased it and I'm so glad I did. It smells nice and works so so fast. My tan lines are crazy :)
customer_reviews.author: AustinCutie

customer_reviews.title: NOT A Self-Tanner!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see the fine print on the back of the bottle until after I'd opened it. While this stuff smells amazing, it's just a dark brown lotion that does nothing. It has NO SPF and NO tanning properties. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: ERR4

customer_reviews.title: It clumps up as if it were expired
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this product, I enjoy all of sun bums products... except this one. It smelt like chocolate which was nice but it doesn’t blend well! It was streaky and most of all it clumped into little balls. As a company you shouldn’t want to sell a product that DOESNT BLEND AND CLUMPS UP.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Stains!
customer_reviews.text: Stains everything! Apply outside. Let it air dry and before you put your clothes on, wash off well. I made the mistake of throwing it in my bag, it stained the inside of my bag. So bring a large ziplock bag for it, to travel and keep it inside when you’re at the beach or poolside.
customer_reviews.author: Laila A.

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: Spray sunscreen is usually oily, shiny, and smells weird and leaves me feeling like I sprayed myself with cooking oil. This oil smells DELIGHTFUL and actually absorbs into the skin, rather than just sitting on top. I feel like I can wear this everyday without smelling like I'm wearing sunscreen, instead I smell like a moisture paradise.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: It’s so right, nothing about it is wrong. I’m very loyal to this brand for many reasons (I live in Hawaii and use their products year round). Definitely tan faster, no dry skin after, no burning, smells amazing, all natural for body and environment.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Pump did not work and it leaked
customer_reviews.text: First time buying this oil. The pump quit working almost immediately. Then later it leaked all in my Vera Bradley beach bag staining it and several other items. I checked the pump and it was screwed on tight so that was not the problem. It also still had the small clear lid on the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Paula C.

customer_reviews.title: It does its job.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this twice so far and I guess it works. Im VERY fair skinned so I have gone from pasty to off white LOL. Please use a good sunscreen with this especially if you are prone to burning.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but smells like fake Hershey’s chocolate
customer_reviews.text: Although I haven’t used it much in the sun, I put it on for a while when the clouds were out. It helped tan me a little more. The smell is what turns me off. It smells straight up like fake Hershey’s chocolate smell. It does moisturize well though. Just kinda smells like something you’d not want on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Gives a great tan but wish it was better priced.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this smells and helps get a great tan but wish it was a better price.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, love the scent, great for tanning, leaves skin brown and soft!!
customer_reviews.author: Olav Amundsen

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: This item took a little bit to get here. My teens ordered it for the beach trip we were taking. The smell was absolutely amazing..it smells like chocolate. It gave you a light brown color when applying so you immediately look as though you have some color. I would have liked it to be. Bit more moisturizing but still it works well especially for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Eeh
customer_reviews.text: While the product smells good, it really did nothing. I didn’t see the results I had anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: GGrobi

customer_reviews.title: sprayer broke
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer broke the first time I used the oil the first day of vacation. I had to pour it in my hand in order to rub it on the rest of the vacation. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: ywl564

customer_reviews.title: Worth a Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand! Their natural products are worth it. I find it smelling kind of like chocolate & coconut. I will say, when you sweat, it sort of smears. But, it’s a great tan! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mickie

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: I normally love this brand. Especially with the lack of chemicals but gosh, this accelerator smells. Normally this products smell amazing so I was definitely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: StephB

customer_reviews.title: Great bronzer
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses this before going to the pool. It goes on well, leaves the skin looking a bit tan and smells good once soaked into your skin. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Creativedrive

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended Vegan brown tanning lotion
customer_reviews.text: Smells delightful Vegan which is amazzze I get a lot of comments about how tan I am wouldn’t use anything else now that I have found this Brown tanning lotion that is Vegan which means no chemicals in product
customer_reviews.author: nadine n.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tan!
customer_reviews.text: I reapplies this every ~2h as recommended and was able to get a nice tan in 2 days. It is oil though so you will be oily, and you will get the bottle oily. But it works as advertised I’d say!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the oil over the lotion
customer_reviews.text: I did not really care for the lotion. While it is less messy than the oil, I got way better results with the oil. It also has a strong smell.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!! LOVE
customer_reviews.text: When I tell you, this is a must buy for tanning or the beach it’s a MUST! This had my tan glowing and dark within the first use! I love it. Smell is great. Only downfall is brown lotion can stain things from sweating it off like on the beach chair
customer_reviews.author: WVUgal

customer_reviews.title: LOVE SUN BUM
customer_reviews.text: I am a Sun Bum..We live in Maui 1/2 of the year and Really swear by their products..High Quality. I am a blond so I tan kinda reddish so this product helps with getting more of a brown tone and it helps with dry skin all day.
customer_reviews.author: ranger

customer_reviews.title: Nozzle doesn’t work:/
customer_reviews.text: My nozzle doesn’t work it doesn’t even spray out the product.....
customer_reviews.author: Kenna

customer_reviews.title: Livid
customer_reviews.text: Did not recieve what was in description... this was supposed to be used during vacation and now I have to go spend extra money on actual SPF lotion, etc.
customer_reviews.author: emma jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent color
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing, I was happy with the color I got after one use. I have used Maui babe and bought this because it's a better value and I feel this works much better I'll be sticking with this product
customer_reviews.author: Shannon P

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice even tan. Didn't burn, but had to shower after using as it is greasy and I'm not crazy about the smell. Didn't feeldried out or dehydrated after using.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Bon

customer_reviews.title: Won't spray
customer_reviews.text: Spray nozzle on both bottles didn't work. One bottle came without a cover
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Florida must have
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Love it living 5 min from the beach it’s a must have for sure. Always by pool or the beach Awesome price smell can’t say anything bad about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah ausbon

customer_reviews.title: Look like a Sun Bum
customer_reviews.text: Smell like coffee, so I was in love. It’s kind of a hit and miss with staining clothing, so make sure you wash immediately if you get the product on clothing or even a white swimsuit. Bronzes you’re skin for a glowy look.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Bronze Goddess
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells like straight chocolate. It's awesome. I naturally have olive toned skin so I ran decently in summer. But this helped my tan look even and the parts that barely get sun like my legs and my stomach tan in no time. My skin glowed and tanned evenly and didnt burn even a little. It wasn't dry after either. My friends were constantly commenting on how looked all bronze goddessy.^-^
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I feel about this yet, it does rub off really easy but it doesn’t stain so that’s good, I did apply it kind of wet the 1st time so I didn’t really see a difference? But that might be on me! It smells great though!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Trevino

customer_reviews.text: it is great! the smell is amazing:) HOWEVER don’t expect results after tanning for 30 minutes! i found that tanning with this 3 days in a row i got a tan! trust the process!
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Def not a sunless tanner, will not last past a shower, but smells amazing and provides a very pretty and temporary dark tan.
customer_reviews.author: carlos

customer_reviews.title: READ BEFORE YOU BUY
customer_reviews.text: What I did not understand when I bought this product is that it is not a self tanner and it does not give you a certain shade of a tan. This product enhances your tan. So if you tan for an hour it will only be a little darker than normal. So if you're like me and tan slowly this product will probably take a long time to work. But it does smell good and I did see that I was a little darker than I probably would be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived without a cap and was leaking everywhere. Of course there is no way to contact anyone about this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Tan lotion
customer_reviews.text: Not to pleased with this product for the price. Thought it was thin for a lotion. Smells like chocolate instead of a tanning lotion. Very staining!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Zontek

customer_reviews.title: Broken spray nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on vacation. Spray pump was broken so we had to pour it into our hands to apply. Such a mess and SO greasy to use this way.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite tanning lotion, it can be very patchy and I have had better scents. If it was a little less thick and more moisturizing I believe it wouldn’t be as patchy! From what I put on though it definitely does help get you that dark bronze tan!
customer_reviews.author: joel

customer_reviews.title: So.. so.. Not sure what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Smells good. Stains light bathing suit. Not sure it really gives you a self tanner/bronze. But I’ll keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: BuffaloGal76

customer_reviews.title: Allergic
customer_reviews.text: Poor stars because even though it is made with all natural ingredients it still gave me an allergic reaction like most sunscreens do.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: No tan.  Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Used for 2 days in a row out at the lake... came home the same color I was when I left. No tan at all. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T. R.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tan, long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: So tan in just 1 use. Beyond happy. Got on white bathing suit but rinsed off in water. Did not rinse off skin. Wear sunscreen underneath, as recommended. Didn’t wear for weeks after last application. Even after exfoliating. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Clint Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Great product...packaging needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: There was a bit of leakage but nothing too great. I usually burn and this made me have a nice tan instead. It is not too oily and smells wonderful. Definitely a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: A.V.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waist your money
customer_reviews.text: Waist of money.didnt do anything ,continued to use it in hopes it would do something.smells like chocolate,really thick
customer_reviews.author: Renee Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this stuff. Ever after literally one use i can see the difference. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: BOMB.
customer_reviews.text: It is so hard for me to tan and after this stuff, just a couple of uses, I now have LINES. Who the heck knew I could tan like this? Its awesome. Recommend for anyone who is pasty white like me and can never get a good tan going.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Scully

customer_reviews.title: Okay Product.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t really noticed a difference with developing more of a tan which is disappointing. It also stains clothes and swim suits and your hands if you don’t wash it off immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Best for tanning
customer_reviews.text: This product smells amazing and makes you look very tan...until you touch water. You have to be careful when you are putting the product on as well because it can stain white counter tops. It smells amazing though and does work very well until you take a shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs a better spray nozzle
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but they need to have better packaging. The sprayer doesn’t work properly!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful brown color and great scent
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful brown color and great scent! Adds lots of color with just one application. I have used it tanning outside and tanning in tanning bed indoors a and I like the results I get!
customer_reviews.author: Kristian and David

customer_reviews.title: Sun Bum = magic 🌞
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love Sun Bum and this product specifically. Love the scent and the feel going on. I sometimes use it just when my skin is dry at the end of the day and it feels great on your skin, especially knees and elbows. I live at the beach and use a bottle each summer season. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael V

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.text: I dont recommend purchasing until they do some quality improvement work on their packaging. Lid wasnt taped on. Oil was leaking out onto other items. Thankfully a white shirt was in plastic wrap so the bronzer didn't get all of it. Paid for a full bottle... got half of one.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Grove

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought the other lotion product available on Amazon last time andnituced immediately that this product was not “tanning” my legs like the other did. It will not be used. Ordered the other product and won’t go back.

product_meta.title: Sun Bum Moisturizing Tanning Oil, SPF 15, 8.5 oz Bottle, 1 Count, Broad Spectrum UVA/UVB Protection, Coconut Oil, Aloe Vera, Hypoallergenic, Paraben Free, Gluten Free, Vegan
product_meta.description: Style Name:tanning oilSome of us love to get golden brown but we still want our skin to be nourished, silky smooth, and protected. Our Broad-Spectrum SPF 15 UVA/UVB Protecting Dark Tanning Oil is enriched with Marula Oil, Argan Oil, Coconut Oil, Avocado Oil, Green Tea Butter and Aloe Vera. Indulge and protect your skin.
feature_bullets: SPF 15 DARK TANNING OIL . For those of us who love to get golden brown but still want our skin to be nourished, silky smooth, and protected. Our broad spectrum SPF 15 UVA/UVB Protecting Dark Tanning Oil is perfect to get bronzed with protection!

MOISTURIZING SUN PROTECTION. Our water resistant and reef friendly sun protection is great for all skin types. Delight your skin with Aloe Vera, Green Tea Butter, Marula, Argan, Coconut and Avocado Oil with our original summer scent.

HOW TO USE. Spray, rub in, and then bask in those sunny rays to achieve your ultimate golden glow! Apply liberally to body and avoid the eye area. Sonny’s Tip: Use with a regular sunscreen to ensure full sun protection.

PROTECT YOUR SKIN. The key to achieving a sun-kissed glow is to protect and moisturize your skin. Our Original Sunscreen line is Hypoallergenic and Oxybenzone, Octinoxate, Gluten, Cruelty and Paraben Free to ensure a fun day in the sun.

TRUST THE BUM. What does that mean? It means trust us, the ones who live on the beach and need products that work on the most intense days in the sun. The simple truth is, when you make products to protect the ones you love, you make ‘em better.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
